io.github.nozyx12.jevent

Class EventException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • io.github.nozyx12.jevent.EventException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EventException
extends java.lang.Exception
    The EventException class represents an exception that occurs during the triggering of an event. This exception includes the event name and the underlying cause of the error.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructs a new EventException with the specified event name and cause.
